data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Hailakandi, Assam, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hailakandi, Assam, India

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Hailakandi, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Hailakandi to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Hailakandi, Assam, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Chepang people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Chepang people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Chepang people is yours.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Hailakandi, Assam, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 659,300 citizens of Hailakandi, Assam, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Hailakandi, Assam, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Hailakandi
location.people_groups_list: Chhetri, Tai Darai, Assamese (Sikh traditions), Bania Brittal, Murasing
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chhetri (247,000), Tai Darai (400), Assamese (Sikh traditions) (1,100), Bania Brittal (52,000), Murasing (14,000)
